name: Piatka
description:
The game get 490 words to guess.
Try to uncover word simply by uncover every single letter.
Get lot of bonuses from teddy bear and parrot.
Use hints as prompts and single letters.
Play on a single playe or multiplayer mode.
Have fun training your mind !


If you guess word without help then you get some bonuses,


Also the game have 3 levels difficulty!
Just guess words and enjoy!


Attention!
To play by internet please open port 25127 in TCP at host computer



13.05.2018 - new wersion!
